amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $64 million provided to the Corporation for National and Community Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that deletes the funds in the bill for the National Service Trust of the Corporation for National and Community Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendment (A018) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Hoekstra.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendment (A018) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
